argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cndrng | |- CCfld e. DivRing |
| 2 |  | #P_zex | |- ZZ e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_df-zring | |- ZZring = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) = ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mgpress | |- ( ( CCfld e. DivRing /\ ZZ e. _V ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ZZ ) = ( mulGrp ` ZZring ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ZZ ) = ( mulGrp ` ZZring ) |
